ea areas around the Island
Showers or thundershowers will occur at several places in the sea areas off the coast extending from
Puttalam to Matara via Colombo and Galle.
Winds will be westerly to south-westerly in the sea areas around the island.

T
he wind speed will be (30-40) kmph and it can increase up to (50-60) kmph at times in the sea areas
